item.title: Activating Young Men of the Aaronic Priesthood
item.description:
Activating Young Men of the Aaronic Priesthood by undefined C. Frederick Pingel, Bishop, Beavercreek Ward, Dayton Ohio East Stake given in Saturday Evening of 152nd Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1982
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined C. Frederick Pingel, Bishop, Beavercreek Ward, Dayton Ohio East Stake
